row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.POWERSHELL_UTILITY
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
!gets the size of a file or directory :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_WINDOWS_STYLE :SET &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "File Path" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Unit" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_FILE_UNIT#
:SET &UC4RB_PV_ERRORS# = 0 ! check for the leading EXT: :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "File Path" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Unit" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_FILE_UNIT#
$errors=0 ! check file existence :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_TYPE@WINDOWS
if ($EXIST -ne 1) { : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "File &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# does not exist" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR $errors = $errors + 1 }
:IF &UC4RB_PV_ERRORS# = 100 __uc_return( 100 ) :ENDIF
if ($errors -gt 0) { __uc_return($errors) }
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION :SET &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&UC4RB_FILE_PATH#,'`','``') if ($ISFILE -eq "1") { $size = (Get-ChildItem '&UC4RB_FILE_PATH#' | Measure-Object -Sum Length).Sum } else { $size = (Get-ChildItem -Recurse '&UC4RB_FILE_PATH#' | Measure-Object -Sum Length).Sum } :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "result: $size" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS

row.post_process:
:SET &result# = 0
:SET &hnd# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,,"*") :PROCESS &hnd# : SET &line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&hnd#,1) : SET &line# = STR_TRIM(&line#) : SET &pos# = STR_FIND(&line#, "result: ")
: IF &pos# > 0 : SET &pos# = &pos# + 8 : SET &line# = MID(&line#, &pos#) : PRINT "Line: &line#." : SET &result# = ADD(&result#, &line#) : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS
:DEFINE &unsigned#, unsigned :SET &UC4RB_FILE_UNIT# = GET_VAR(PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PRV.VARA.FILE_SIZE_UNITS,&UC4RB_FILE_UNIT#,2) :SET &unsigned# = DIV(&result#, &UC4RB_FILE_UNIT#) :PSET &UC4RB_OUT_SIZE# = &unsigned#
